 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רוּד‎</span> **verb** ==wander restlessly, roam== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***go to and fro*** [[[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xxxvii (1883), 539</sup>], Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***run upon, invade, attack***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִד רָד עִם אֵל‎</span> [[Hos.12.1|Hos 12:1]], figurative, corrupt, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] apparently <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַתָּ יְדָעָם‎</span>, [[BDB#We|We]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִדַּר דַּעַת‎</span> ***lacks knowledge***, [[BDB#Now|Now]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָדֻעַ‎</span>, Bewer<sup>JBL xxi (1902), 108 f.</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹד יְדָעָם‎</span>; 1 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֵדְנוּ‎</span> [[Jer.2.31|Jer 2:31]] figurative of Israel; read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְרַדְתִּי‎</span> perhaps [[Judg.11.37|Judg 11:37]] literal, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ירד‎</span> **1 g. Hiph\`il** ***shew restlessness: Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּאֲשֶׁר תָּרִיד‎</span> [[Gen.27.40|Gen 27:40]] (dubious [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>l.c. 540</sup>); 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָדִיד בְּשִׂיחִי‎</span> [[Ps.55.3|Ps 55:3]] ***I shew restlessness (?) in my murmuring.***
